title: Effects of time dependence in the second order coherence of pulsed light
summary: This paper investigates the effects of time dependence on the second-order coherence of pulsed light. It calculates the distribution of photon arrival time differences, showing strong bunching, and explains how to account for pulse shape.
usefulness_reason: Clearly relevant to "Temporal" aspect due to "time dependence" and "temporal distribution of photons". While not explicitly "spatio", the concept of photon arrival times can be considered a point process in time. The "distribution of photon arrival time differences" is a key indicator.
